From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>


Phobia studied the layout of Destructors ship, It wasn't as large as the
Cybertronian fire or the Predacon base but it was big enough to house a
small army if necessary. He found the bridge and entered sitting in the
first officers chair and putting his feat up. The bridge design was larger
than the last Predacon ship he had been stationed on but similar in
construction. The seats were designed to fit nearly any form so his spider
legs didn't present a problem for him. He looked up at the viewscreen
remembering the days he'd manipulate the commander into a foolish act so he
could replace him with an even more gullable first officer. Phobia
remembered back to when he got his own ship from the scavengers who'd found
his ship and crew after the temporal wave had hit them. "Poor fools" he
thought as he sat there in a position of power,"They never knew what killed
them."

>
